text: <!channel>: I'm working from home today, so let's do a virtual stand-up, please.

hey mary, putting all the screens in another UX deck for the snap finger and add from camera roll for title card features. i think we should have an internal review tomorrow with everyone to go over these two sections. what do you think?
I'd be happy to schedule that
I'm still working on Add From Camera Roll. Yesterday I discovered that we need to write our own "scale & crop" screen, so I've been doing that today.
internal review for tomorrow sounds great, but I'll need to WFH on thursday
Do you need UX/design support on that, Spencer?
I wasn't sure from the last update
I'm happy to demo what I have tomorrow, and get feedback on UX then
So far the crop screen is very simple
just a title, Cancel and Done buttons, and an image in the middle with the crop mask over it
I have been laying the foundation for stickers and will likely be ready for some UI to start on it tomorrow.
If UI is available - I can still do plenty of work without official UI
